channel.title: Harper Phone India Philosophy Nokia on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Harper Phone India Philosophy Nokia on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: wheee
item.description: i got my tickets to india today. it is pretty funny how every little step makes it more and more real. I imagien I iwll be writing on the plane “i am in the air, it now seems real.” haha. I leave in 5 days. I can barely believe that 3 weeks ago - I had no idea this was to be happening. this is going to be a good summer.
